name: Car War Legends
description:
{steam_app_image}/extras/title_chain.png

car War Legends

Overcome dangerous obstacles, Battle against other drivers, and Race to the death in this
intense car racing game!
Do you have what it takes to survive and win?
Push your ride to its limits and reign supreme as CAR WAR LEGEND!

● Destroy Your competitors
Battle against other drivers to death and destruction!
● Race to victory
Push your accelerator and race to the finish line!
● Build a killer vehicle
Earn points after every win and upgrade your vehicle! Use your points to get superior
armor, weapons, and engine for your machine.
● High-quality graphics and smooth gameplay
Designed for a high-intensity playing experience!
